name: Abinash Tripathy
bio: Dr. Abinash Tripathy is working as Associate Professor in the School of Computer Application, KIIT Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar.  He has completed his Ph.D. from National Institute of Technology, Rourkela in 2017, M.Tech. from department of Computer Science and Engineering, KIIT Deemed to be University in 2009. He has an experience of 12 years in industry / teaching at UG and PG level. He has worked as faculty in Raghu Engineering College, Visakhapatnam, NIST, Berhampur and MITS, Rayagada. His research interest includes sentiment analysis, Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning.  He has published research articles  in Expert system with Application, Elsevier, Knowledge and Information System, Springer, Multimedia Tools and Application, Springer and Complex and Intelligent Systems, Springer etc.

name: Ajit Kumar Sahoo
bio: Dr. Ajit Kumar Sahoo received the Ph.D. degree in Computer Science in the area of intelligent sensing from   the School of Computer and Information Sciences, University of Hyderabad, India, in 2023 and   M.Tech. degree in Information Technology from Tezpur Central University, Tezpur, India, in 2013.  He also worked as Post Doctoral Research Fellow (PDRF) in University of Hyderabad before joining the KIIT University. He has three years of teaching and research experience.  His research focus is on Intelligent sensing, Wi-Fi sensing and its applications in different fields, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and Artificial Intelligence.

name: Bishnupriya Panda
bio: Dr. Bishnupriya Panda earned her Ph.D. in Computational Proteomics in 2019 from Siksha ‘O’ Anusandhan University. She earned her Master’s degree in Computer Science and Engg. in 2013 as a University Gold medalist. She completed her B.Tech. in CS&E. in 2005 from ITER, BPUT Odisha. She has around 17 years of academic experience and actively involved in research since last 7 years in Computational Proteomics. She has published many papers of national and international repute to her credit. She has profound expertise in machine learning, data science, algorithm analysis and many programming languages like python, Matlab, C++ and C. She was previously working as an Associate Professor in S’O’A deemed to be University where she was actively involved in many organizational roles along with academics. She is very much to collaborate in research and other aspects of organizational development.

name: Chinmaya Misra
bio: Dr Chinmaya Misra. He is a Life Member of the Indian Science Congress. He is the Associate Professor in the School Of Computer Applications, KIIT Deem to be University, Bhubaneswar, India. He is working in Energy Saving Mechanism in WiMaX and Image Processing and Queuing System, Cloud Computing and Social Networking. He has completed his MCA from North Bengal University in 1999 and received his MS degree from  School of Information Technology, IIT Kharagpur in [2008]. He completed his PhD from KIIT Deemed to be University from School of Computer Science and Enginneringin in [2014]. In [1999] he started his professional career as [Programming Assistant] in IIT Kharagpur and joined as lecturer in KIIT Deemed to be university as [Lecturer] in 2008. He has published many research works in reputed journals and conferences.

name: Debasmita Pradhan
bio:
Dr. Debasmita Pradhan has 18 years of teaching experience and ten years of research experience in Computer Science and Engineering. Her  portfolio includes teaching core computer science subjects such as Data structures, algorithms, and  advanced computer science subjects such as Soft Computing, Machine Learning, Parallel Distributed Systems, Big Data analysis, Hadoop, Map Reduce, etc. She has expertize in the programming languages like  C, C++, JAVA, MATLAB, and Python and supervises them in developing models using machine learning and Python to solve real-life problems.
Her research expertise is in Machine Learning and Systems Biology, which aligns well with state-of-the-art research and professional service activities for the betterment of society at large. She completed her Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from the School of Computer Engineering in 2021.  She also received the prestigious ""Research Foundation Day Award"" from Biju Pattanaik University of Technology in 2020 for her outstanding research publication. Apart from teaching and research, she is actively involved in several administrative responsibilities and student-related activities. She monitors the technical projects done by the students in their 3rd and 4th years of Btech and ensures their quality. As mentor of students she stays connected with the students and guide them for their professional, physical, and emotional well-being. Students love to be in touch with her during their difficult times and have confidence in her to share their problems and to take effective guidance.
She is also a member of IEEE and an active member of the IEEE Bhubaneswar sub-section. She is Vice-Chair, of Students Activities, IEEE, Bhubaneswar Sub-section, and Secretary, Women in Engineering(WIE), IEEE, Bhubaneswar Sub-section. She actively participates in organizing different Technical and Socio-Technical events under the banner of WIE, IEEE ,Bhubaneswar sub-section.

name: Hemant Kumar Apat
bio: Dr. Hemant Kumar Apat is an academic and researcher in the field of Cloud and Fog Computing, Internet of Things (IoT), Blockchain-assisted Security, and Optimization Algorithms. He earned his Ph.D. in Computer Science and Engineering from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Rourkela, where his doctoral research focused on developing performance enhancement strategies for fog–cloud computing environments. His work proposed innovative task placement and optimization techniques aimed at minimizing latency, energy consumption, and cost while ensuring secure and scalable service delivery in IoT-based systems. He is currently serving as an Assistant Professor at the School of Computer Applications, KIIT Deemed-to-be University, Bhubaneswar, where he teaches core computer science subjects including Cloud Computing, Data Structures, Design and Analysis of Algorithms, Optimization Theory, and Data Mining. He obtained his M.Tech. from Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology (MANIT), Bhopal, in 2018, where he explored graph-theoretic approaches in bioinformatics. Dr. Apat’s research outcomes include several SCI-indexed publications, international conference papers, book chapters, and multiple patent filings. His current research continues to focus on optimizing distributed computing architectures and integrating emerging technologies for sustainable and intelligent IoT-driven applications.

name: Jayant Kumar Rout
bio: Dr. Jayant Kumar Rout is working as an Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Application, KIIT-DU Bhubaneswar. He is a distinguished academician with a robust educational background and a wealth of experience in the field of teaching and research. He graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Electronics and Telecommunication Engineering from KIIT, Bhubaneswar, in 2003, and his M.Tech. from the Dept. of Electrical and Electronics Engineering, IIT Guwahati, in 2011. He completed his Ph.D. from the Dept. of Electronics and Communication Engineering, NIT, Patna, in 2023. With an impressive 19 years of teaching experience at UG and PG levels, Dr. Jayant has demonstrated his expertise in the classroom and beyond. His research focuses on cutting-edge areas such as Speech Signal Processing, Keyword Spotting, Automatic Speech Recognition, and Machine Learning. His contributions to these fields are evidenced by his research publications in esteemed conferences and journals, including IET Signal Processing; Speech Signal Processing, Elsevier; Circuits, Systems, and Signal Processing Springer, etc. Throughout his career, Dr. Jayant has been committed to advancing the frontiers of knowledge and nurturing the next generation of scholars. His dedication to excellence in both teaching and research has earned him widespread recognition and respect within the academic community.

tab_details.Research Interests: Speech Signal Processing, Keyword Spotting, Automatic Speech Recognition.

name: Jnyana Ranjan Mohanty
bio: Dr. Jnyana Ranjan Mohanty received his Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from Utkal University, Bhubaneswar in the year 2008. He has more than 25 years of teaching experience (UG & PG levels). He joined KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar in July 1997 as a Lecturer, and presently he is a  Professor. He has served KIIT  in different  administrative capacities too (as Associate Dean & Controller of Examinations). Presently, he is the Registrar of KIIT Deemed to be University. Prior to joining KIIT, he served  as a Lecturer at Institute of Business Administration and Training, Bhubaneswar. He is actively engaged in research work and has a number of Ph.D. scholars under his guidance. He has authored books and has to his credit innumerable publications in reputed International Scopus/ SCI indexed journals and in International Conference proceedings. He has also edited books published by Springer and  IJCA Volumes. He has conducted several conferences and workshops as the organising chair/ program chair. His research interests include Queuing Theory, Computational Intelligence, and Cloud Computing.

name: Lucy Dash

She is very much to collaborate in research and other aspects of organizational development.

name: NILKANTA DAS
bio: "Dr. Nilkanta Das is an Assistant Professor (I) at the School of Computer Application, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (KIIT) University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. He achieved his Ph.D. in Mathematics from the National Institute of Technology (NIT) Rourkela, supported by a prestigious Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR) fellowship from the Government of India. His doctoral thesis, titled ""Numerous Novel Analytical Techniques for Solving Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations Arising in Physical Systems,"" reflects his significant contributions to the field. Dr. Das completed his M.Sc. in Mathematics in 2017 and his B.Sc. in Mathematics (Major) in 2015. He also achieved his 10th and 12th standard education from the West Bengal State Boards in 2010 and 2012, respectively. He has successfully qualified in several competitive exams, including the CSIR UGC NET JRF, GATE, and Assam SLET. With five years of rigorous research experience, Dr. Das is a dedicated researcher with a strong focus on advancing Applied Mathematics, Fractional Calculus, Mathematical Physics, Nonlinear Dynamics, and Mathematical Photonics. He has published nine research papers in prestigious SCI-indexed international journals and presented a conference paper at an IEEE conference."

name: Parthasarathi Pattnayak
bio: Dr. Parthasarathi Pattnayak received his Ph.D in Computer Science from Berhampur University, Odisha. M.Tech with specialization in Information Technology from Utkal University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha. Completed his Master in Business Administration. from F.M. University, Baleswar, Odisha. Dr. Pattnayak received best paper award in IRES-2017 at Asian Institute of Technology,Bangkok ,Thailand. He has more than 13+ year’s of experience in teaching at UG and PG level. He served as a faculty of the institute of Business and Computer studies at Siksha 'O' Anusandhan Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, Odisha, from 2009 to 2011. He joined KIIT University from June 2011. Additionally, he is the Coordinator International Students KIIT Deemed to be University, Faculty in charge International students and attendance committee of School of Computer applications KIIT Deemed to be University. He has various publications to his credit in leading journals and conferences indexed in Scopus. The research interests of Dr. Pattnayak are Supply Chain Management,RFID, Cloud Computing. Machine Learning, Software Engineering, Green Supply Chain, IoT, etc.

name: Rabindra Kumar Barik
bio: Dr. Rabindra K Barik is currently working as an Associate Professor in School of Computer Applications, KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar, India. He has received his both M.Tech and Ph.D. from Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology Allahabad,Prayagraj,  India in 2009 and 2014 respectively. His research area includes Geospatial Data Science, Geosaptial Big Data Infrastructure, Geospatial Database, Geospatial Cloud Computing, Fog Computing and IPR. He has published more than 20 international journals like Springer, Elsevier,  and IGI Global etc. He has also published more than 30 conference papers in various top level conferences like GlobalSIP, CHASE, TENCON, INDICON etc. He has more than 15 book chapters on his credit. Prior to this, He has edited one book on Springer Nature named as Cloud Computing for Geospatial Big Data Analytics: Intelligent Edge, Fog and Mist Computing in the series of Studies in Big Data. He is reviewers of many journals like Springer, Elsevier, IEEE, IGI Global etc. He is also served as TPC and PC members in many conferences. He is a member of IEEE and IAENG.

name: Satya Subha Shree Sen
bio: Satya Subha Shree Sen is currently working as Assistant Professor in the School of Computer Applications, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar, India. He has worked in the field of Computational Fluid Dynamics at Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar, India. His research interests include Computational Fluid Dynamics, Heat and Mass Transfer, Hybrid Nanofluid, Flow Over Stretching Surface, Flow Over a Cylinder etc. He uses different advance environments like MATLAB, Mathematica, Latex, etc., for his research. He has published research articles in various SCI/Scopus Indexed Journals like International Communications in Heat and Mass Transfer, Physica Scripta, Heat Transfer etc.

name: Seema Gupta Bhol
bio: Dr. Seema Gupta Bhol is a highly accomplished professional with a strong academic background and extensive experience in the field of Computer Science. With a PhD and M.Tech in Computer Science, and M.Sc. in Mathematical Sciences (with a specialization in Theoretical Computer Science). Dr. Bhol's academic journey includes her outstanding performance during her M.Sc. in Mathematical Sciences, where she secured a gold medal for her exceptional academic achievements. With over 20 years of teaching experience, Dr. Bhol has inspired many students to excel in the field of Computer Science. She has served as a faculty member at prestigious institutions, including Delhi University and the National Institute of Financial Management (NIFM), Ministry of Finance, Government of India. Dr. Bhol has made significant contributions to the field of Multi Criteria Decision Making, Cybersecurity through her research and publications.

name: Sumanto Dutta
bio: Sumanto Dutta is an Assistant Professor at the School of Computer Applications, KIIT University. Before joining KIIT University in December 2023, he was a PhD research scholar with the National Institute of Technology Rourkela. He did his MTech in Computer Science from the National Institute of Technology, Rourkela, Odisha, India, in 2019. He has a total of 4.3 years of teaching experience. He has been an assistant professor at the Institute of Industrial and Computer Management and Research and Maharashtra Institute of Technology - School of Management in Pune, India. His main research interests are Spatiotemporal Data Analysis, Data Mining, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence.

name: Sumit Kumar Tetarave
bio: Dr. Sumit Kumar Tetarave received his Ph.D. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from IIT Patna, in 2020. After Ph.D., he joined a one-year post-doctoral position with the Department of Computer Science at the University of Texas at San Antonio (UTSA), USA. He had worked in collaboration with the University Health System (the 3rd largest public health system in Texas) on steps to improve patient outcomes using data analytics and artificial intelligence models. Due to Dr. Tetarave’s research dedication, UTSA provided him with a POI-collaborator status to continue his work from India until August 2023. His research interests include P2P network security and Artificial Intelligence.

tab_details.Research Interests: Security issues in peer-to-peer overlay networks and machine learning algorithms.

name: Utpal Chandra De
bio: Dr. Utpal Chandra De graduated with a Ph. D. in Computer Science & Engineering from Sri Sri University (SSU). He has worked in industry/teaching at the UG and PG levels for over 25 years. He was a Head Learning and Development at ISDAC (ATC of C-DAC), Bhubaneswar. He began working at KIIT University on July 09, 2009, and has since advanced from Assistant Professor-I to Assistant Professor-II. He also oversees SCA's Labs and is actively involved in academic mentoring, lesson planning, and curriculum development. In addition to his many other responsibilities at KIIT University, he also develops educational content and plans structured lessons. He also helps students with their research and academic mentoring. He has a number of papers to his name in prestigious conferences and journals that are listed in Scopus.

name: Veena Goswami
role: Director General, School of Computer Applications
bio:
Veena Goswami is currently a Professor in the School of Computer Applications,
Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology, Bhubaneswar, India. She received her Ph.D degree from Sambalpur University, India, in the year 1994 and then worked as post-doctoral fellow at Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur for two years. Her research interests include continuous-  and discrete-time queues. She has published research articles in INFORMS Journal of computing, Computers and Operations Research, Applied Mathematical Modelling, Performance Evaluation, Computers and Mathematics with Applications, Computers and Industrial Engineering, Applied Mathematics and Computation, Methodology and Computing in Applied Probability,  etc.
